chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 product has the above problem:

I bought the phone with excellent quality, but what was delivered was a phone with damaged camera lenses that look like mouse teeth. The category doesn't match, meaning the agreed-upon condition wasn't delivered.
The screen also has a noticeable scratch and several small scratches. Unfortunately, I always get a reflection on this picture. The category doesn't match again!! The category doesn't match therefore.

I would be agreeable to a price reduction of 60 Euros.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we will refund €60 to the customer for aesthetic grade discrepancy.

Kind regards, Diogo from Back Market
